page.title: List of supporting Harry Potter characters

rev.diff:
Line 283: Line 283:
'''Lily Luna Potter''' is the only daughter of Harry and Ginny, and is the youngest of their three children. She is named after Harry's mother and her parents' dear friend, [[Dumbledore's Army#Luna Lovegood|Luna Lovegood]].<ref name='Rowling Documentary'>J.K.Rowling â A Year In The Life; James Runcie; Independent Television (ITV); 2007</ref> Her red hair was inherited from her mother and both of her grandmothers. She is two years younger than her brother Albus, and is the same age as Ron and Hermione's son Hugo. In the epilogue of ''Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows'', she accompanied her parents as they escorted James and Albus to Platform 9Â¾.
'''Lily Luna Potter''' is the only daughter of Harry and Ginny, and is the youngest of their three children. She is named after Harry's mother and her parents' dear friend, [[Dumbledore's Army#Luna Lovegood|Luna Lovegood]].<ref name='Rowling Documentary'>J.K.Rowling â A Year In The Life; James Runcie; Independent Television (ITV); 2007</ref> Her red hair was inherited from her mother and both of her grandmothers. She is two years younger than her brother Albus, and is the same age as Ron and Hermione's son Hugo. In the epilogue of ''Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows'', she accompanied her parents as they escorted James and Albus to Platform 9Â¾.
â
Lily will be played by Jessamy Halliwell in ''Deathly Hallows: Part 2.''
+
Lily will be played by Geraldine Somerville in ''Deathly Hallows: Part 2.''
